subtask1.ensemble: No, only a single model was used for the turn detection
subtask1.desc: Task 1: Baseline-inspired binary classifier: Roberta, fine-tuned on dstc9 data with added noise (random fillers) + keyword search to validate the prediction

subtask2.ensemble: Yes, multiple model outputs were combined for the knowledge selection
subtask2.pretrained: major vote between GPT2 and Roberta
subtask2.desc: The system is a voting  ensemble over system versions 1-4 for entity selection. For document selection we computed Kendall’s concordance coefficient W. For the cases, when W < 0.6, we randomly  shuffled the documents ranking, otherwise the ranking was preserved.

subtask3.ensemble: No, only a single model was used for the response generation
subtask3.desc: Task 3: answer from the question-answer pair is returned.
